16:37 <tekzilla> hi, after migrating to a new version and mysql db, document creation dates were the import date  
16:37 <tekzilla> vmassol already stated that this sounds like a bug  
16:37 <tekzilla> anyway, i wrote this little perl script to fix the dates from the history  
16:37 <tekzilla> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Fix+doc+creation+dates+after+import  
16:38 <tekzilla> i hope i put it in the right place, maybe you guys wanna have a look at it

20:47 <vmassol1> Enygma`: I'm just starting on the autocomplete hackathon (I just finished another hackathon topic)  
20:48 <vmassol1> could you remind me how to set it up? I ran the functional tests to get a proper xwiki packaging but it doesn't seem to be working  
20:51 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
20:53 <sburjan> has quit  
20:55 <Enygma`> vmassol1: get the latest sources, build the whole thing, add the jar to the lib directory and import both xars into the wiki  
20:55 <Enygma`> I`m currently using 5.1 final  
20:56 <vmassol1> ok I'll try manually. The func test module has the right dep so these 2 xars should be imported.  
20:56 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
21:07 <Enygma`> didn`t play much with that  
21:08 <Enygma`> I remember trying it once and it worked, but that was before I started working again on the code :)  
21:08 <Enygma`> though my memory could play tricks on me :)  
21:09 <vmassol> :)
